Mayor & City Council
====================

Meetings
--------

* 5:30 p.m.
* Third Tuesday of each month
* City Council Chambers  
  200 N Bell Street  
  Willis, TX 77378

### Willis’ Governing Structure

The City of Willis operates under a City Council/City Manager form of government. Citizens are represented on the City Council by 6 elected members - The Mayor and 5 City Council Members.

### Meet Your Elected Officials
